title: 80s remix: Rihanna - Umbrella (1988) | exile synthwave remix

lastfm.summary: "Umbrella" is a song by Barbadian singer Rihanna from her third studio album "Good Girl Gone Bad". It features American rapper Jay-Z, who co-wrote the song with its producers Tricky Stewart and Kuk Harrell, with additional writing from The-Dream. The song was originally written with Britney Spears in mind, but her label rejected it. "Umbrella" is a pop, hip-hop and R&B song with rock elements, referring to a romantic and platonic relationship and the strength of that relationship. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Umbrella
